Review.Contenu: Website stated 50 in stock about 5 minutes later I received an email stating that the items were on backorder. Yet their ability to run the payment wasn't hindered!

I ordered 10 six pin device base you sent 10 three pin device bases. The ship ticket has the right part number on it for what I ordered but you sent parts that do not match the ship ticket. If this is all you do is sell fire alarm parts I know you know the difference. This makes me feel like you are being dishonest.

Review.Titre: Thank you for the opportunity to…
Review.Contenu: Thank you for the opportunity to express my opinion. I came to your business as I have been for at least 15 years. I had 2 boards for repair 1 which was a very typical sk5495 (silent knight) which I can purchase for $125.00 repaired.. instead of having a conversation with me I was charged over $500.00 for a repair. I can purchase this with a can for less than 400.00.. I have this board in my warehouse even now because I wasn't even given the battery plug that is required for this board. I can't make a profit with this experience on this item because your company out profit over decency..

Review.Titre: The refurbished panel would not dial…
Review.Contenu: The refurbished panel would not dial out.the QC was not of the highest quality.  the battery wires and AC transformer wires were not included.
FAST AND EFFICIENT BUT IT IS NOT DIALING AND ZONE 2 IS DEAD

We passed our inspection and are allowed to open school on Tuesday!  You are a very smart guy!! Enjoy your weekend and thanks again.Bob SutterSuperintendent in New Jersey

Review.Titre: Buy Fire Alarm Parts is top notch!
Review.Contenu: I have been using Buy Fire Alarm Parts for a couple years now purchasing fire alarm panels and having them repair our panels, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with their outstanding work. From start to finish, the experience was top-notch and hassle-free.We are located in the lightning capital of the world here in West Central Florida and I’m sure I’ll be doing much more business with them.

Rate 5-star. Have interfaced with 3 separate employees and all friendly, helpful, professional and show a high level of care for my needs/concerns -  and deliver what's promised. Ask for anything more...?

Review.Titre: Nikki from Customer Support was a star!
Review.Contenu: Nikki from Customer Support was a star!We had to wait for confirmation from a client for a product and Nikki made it very simple to place an order on hold until we had approval. Once we had approval, our item was shipped in a very timely manner.

The repairs were done properly, promptly, and tested thoroughly. If there was any question about the products performance, they would demonstrate it on the bench.I have found them to be fair and honest.

Hunter really surpassed our expectations. He went above and beyond to help us with a fire alarm panel repair. They helped our client save thousands! Now our client is loyal more than ever. We can say first hand that "Buy Fire Alarm Parts" do stand behind their repairs. They have earned our future business for sure.

Review.Titre: My house is on the beach in a salt air…
Review.Contenu: My house is on the beach in a salt air environment. My previous alarm disintegrated due to the harsh environment. I bought a replacement from another company but the mechanism housing was pot metal. It would not have lasted a week.Yours is sealed heavy plastic. Just what I needed. I realized that the gong has to be metal but yours has a nice paint coat on it. If it wears out I will just replace that part and not the whole mechanism.

I highly recommend this company if you are in need of a fire alarm part... especially those that are hard to find. I worked with Hunter who was extremely knowledgeable, professional and responsive. His input helped me navigate a tricky, time-sensitive situation and saved our nonprofit from having to completely replace a fire panel. Thank you, Hunter!

I went on the Buy Fire Alarm Parts website to look into getting a panel repaired and discovered that they had a new panel in stock. I had it express shipped and received it in two days. With the supply chain problems everyone is feeling right now, it was a huge relief to get the panel so quickly. It was also a little less expensive than the local fire alarm dealer's price.

We had a customer who's obsolete fire alarm panel had a control board that failed. After a fairly extensive search, I found that board available here.The price was reasonable and it shipped quick. The board was installed, and everything is back to working properly. I called to verify this was available, and the customer service was awesome! Great Company to work with!!!

BuyFireAlarmParts.com is the most clutch site for proprietary and non-propreitary fire alarm parts. shipping isn't bad either I work in Maryland and never have a problem getting my parts on time. Six stars.

i've ordered a few times.  always exactly as described, packaged well, easly online ordering GUI.  I'll be a customer in regards to my business for the foreseeable future.

Spoke to customer rep about an old board for a Miniscan 524 - very helpful, referred me to an expert in the office, shipped the board the same day - there was one in stock...all this on 12/23/21 after 2 pm eastern time.  Couldn't be better.

Review.Titre: We all know how tough it is to get…

WOW!! I am so thankful to have found BUYFIREALARMPARTS! We have a Faraday FireWatch XVI system  and were not able to locate a replacement part for the memory board. These guys are the real deal and fixed our memory board and shipped it back to us in San Diego within the week. They are so professional and very easy to work with. They are at the top of my list, should I ever have the need again to fix anything related to our fire alarm at church and school. The process was pretty easy, we had our company in San Diego remove the memory board on Monday. We overnight shipped it by Fed Ex (not cheap $125), they fixed the part and return shipped it to us for $115 overnight. The cost was so much more reasonable than having to replace the entire system.
